SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Display all translation suggestions
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: Will display the list of possible translations instead of automatically selecting the first result

SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Replace duplicate cards
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: When trying to add a new card, if the same card already exists -- based on the English and Swedish words -- then the existing card will be replaced. If disabled, then the new card will not be added.

ListPreference.android:title: Set default translation mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Will set the default manual or auto translation mode when adding a new flash card
